title: WeSe2024-DAHEP
text:
This is the interactive website associated with the course “Data Analysis in High Energy Physics”. The website hosts julia notebooks from the lectures taught in the class, biweekly tutorials for code polishing and extra revisions and exercises to test the concepts of the lecture.
The exercise repository can be found here

title: Lecture01Trial
text:
Code
begin
    using Pkg
    Pkg.activate(joinpath("/home/dhruvanshu/ExercisesDataAnalysisWS2425"))
    Pkg.instantiate()
    using DataAnalysisWS2425
    using QuadGK
    using Plots
end
